title: Criteria for distinguishing heterogeneous from homogeneous conditions for aromatic diisocyanates in water

Environmental fate and toxicity testing typically requires knowledge of the water solubility of the test substances. Determining the solubility of aromatic diisocyanates in water poses great challenges because of their...
